rationale: Assessed as Least Concern due to the lack of any known major threats to this species.  However, as this species has a fairly restricted extent of occurrence, were this species to become exposed to any threats in the future, it is likely to become threatened.
assessor: Snoeks, J., Laleye, P. & Contreras-MacBeath, T.
evaluator: Collen, B., Darwall, W., Ram, M. & Smith, K. (SRLI Freshwater Fish Evaluation Workshop)
